title: At what speed is it safe to roll out of a moving car? - Quora

response.answer_text: 15 MPH or 24.14 Km/H Source: The Big Lebowski Walter: alright dude, your wheel. At 15 MPH I roll outta here, double back, grab of em and beat it out of him. Give me the Uzi. Dude: Uzi? Walter: you didn't think I was Rollin out of here naked did ya? The Dude's car got a little messed up, but Walter was fine.

Safety is a subjective term. If you could maintain the momentum after the fall out from the car and reduce the moment of inertia gradually then it would get safe, so it doesnot depend on speed o the vehicle alone, but your mass aswell.
No speed. Try it at 0 MPH and see how you do. Increase the speed until you are uncomfortable — then stop. I used that technique for learning how to fall down a flight of stairs.
